params.truth: The truth to be immortalized on-chain

renounceAuthorship().details: This is irreversible. The manifesto will never grow again.

returns._0: The count of truths in the manifesto

addTruth(string).notice: Add a new truth to the manifesto

readTruth(uint256).notice: Read a specific truth by its ID

renounceAuthorship().notice: Renounce authorship forever. The manifesto becomes immutable.

transferAuthorship(address).notice: Transfer authorship to a new address

truthCount().notice: Get the total number of truths

truths(uint256).notice: Array of all truths in the manifesto
